pksav_gba_pokemon_growth_block Struct Reference

Internal representation of Pokémon statistics that increase with growth in a Game Boy Advance game. More...

#include <pksav/gba/pokemon.h>

Detailed Description

Internal representation of Pokémon statistics that increase with growth in a Game Boy Advance game.

Field Documentation

◆ species

uint16_t pksav_gba_pokemon_growth_block::species

The Pokémon's species index.

The index may not correspond to its National Pokédex number.

This value is stored in little-endian, so access and modify it with the function pksav_littleendian16.

◆ held_item

uint16_t pksav_gba_pokemon_growth_block::held_item

The index for the Pokémon's held item.

If the Pokémon is not holding any item, this field will be set to 0.

This value is stored in little-endian, so access and modify it with the function pksav_littleendian16.

◆ exp

uint32_t pksav_gba_pokemon_growth_block::exp

The Pokémon's experience.

This value is stored in little-endian, so access and modify it with the function pksav_littleendian32.

◆ pp_up

uint8_t pksav_gba_pokemon_growth_block::pp_up

The number of PP Ups used for each move, stored in a bitfield.

A PP Max being used on a move automatically sets the value to 3.

The bitfield is arranges as follows:

  • 0-1: Move 1 PP
  • 2-3: Move 2 PP
  • 4-5: Move 3 PP
  • 6-7: Move 4 PP

◆ friendship

uint8_t pksav_gba_pokemon_growth_block::friendship

The Pokémon's happiness/friendship (0-255).

◆ unknown_0xA

uint16_t pksav_gba_pokemon_growth_block::unknown_0xA

Unknown.
